title: Loving, Never Forgetting
overview: She first met him when the blooming lotus flower was falling, only to have to part ways.Years later, when they reunited, Li Zhong Mou had all but forgotten of Wu Tong's existence, leaving her forlorn, except the only thing he wants now from her is the guardianship to their son. 7 years long years together, can they fix their broken relationship?
